entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
